listitem.para: This page displays your saved bags and queries.
A saved query is a copy of the actual query configuration, while a saved bag contains specific data saved from a particular query.

All queries run are saved in the query history. If you do not give your query a particular name (in the 'Save query' box at the bottom of the query interface), it will be saved as query_x (where x increments for each query run).
Saved bags are created by saving specific data from the results page.
Click on the query name to display the query in the query builder interface. From here you can edit the query or run it again
Click on the bag name to view its items in the results page.
Select the check-boxes of the bags or queries you wish to delete and press the appropriate Delete button.
